translation.en: The question first is whether I committed murder.
The courts, they have decided... no.
And the courts, they have decided.
That doesn't answer my question, does it?
There are those who would say you got away with it.
translation.ko: 당신이 운 좋게 빠져나갔다고 말하는 사람들이 있어요

translation.en: After all, I cannot now face trial...
translation.ko: 지금 저는 재판을 받을 수 없으니까요

translation.en: This is Alain, who I was telling you about.
[in French] Looks like it's a fun night.
[Charles] Relax, we must take the fever down.
[in French] Can you bring me his bag?
but next summer we'll open offices in Paris and Zurich.
translation.ko: 내년 여름에 파리와 취리히에 사무실을 열 거예요

translation.en: We have a network of couriers throughout Asia and Western Europe.
Which is how we are able to offer such attractive prices.
translation.ko: 그래서 이렇게 매력적인 가격을 제시할 수 있는 거죠

translation.en: But not entirely kwailo, are you?
and my mama is from Vietnam.
But listen to me and I am French.
-Wim. -Don't you want to know the cost?
Then you are buying for someone.
If you'd like, I'm certain I can break him down to... this?
translation.ko: 사겠다면 이 가격까지 깎아줄 수 있어요

translation.en: How long have you been gone from home?
-A year. -And you have not run out of money yet?
But still, you want to tell Lena that you love her.
I could have you made a sapphire set in diamonds
on a platinum ring for half the price I just showed you,
translation.ko: 방금 보여준 가격의 반값에 사게 해준다면

translation.en: [woman, in Dutch] We didn't come out here for jewelry.
translation.ko: 보석 사러 온 게 아니잖아 "네덜란드 제품"

translation.en: [in Dutch] That money could keep us going to Kathmandu, even Kabul.
translation.ko: 그 돈이면 카트만두랑 카불에도 갈 수 있어

translation.en: [in Dutch] We've got to go home some time.
-[in Dutch] You want to go home? -[music plays on radio]
[in Dutch] Just whatever's next for us.
translation.ko: 귀국해서 필요한 걸 살 수 있어

translation.en: [in Dutch] Like an old married couple, then?
-[in Dutch] An old married couple? -[she yells and laughs]
You do not need to decide now. Do they?
We're going to see you in Bangkok, yes?
Are you sure it's okay for us to stay?
-Yes, of course it is. -Our home is always open to friends.
Let him buy you the ring, Lena.
-[in Dutch] Are you sure? No... -[in Dutch] Yes... Of course.
Uh, what time did the others leave?
It's just this gentleman, Mr. Hilgers,
is asking for help in locating his sister-in-law Helena Dekker
translation.ko: 자기 처제인 헬레나 데커르를 찾아달라고 요청했어
그녀의 남자친구 빌럼 블룸도 함께 말야

translation.en: To help us, he also enclosed an accompanying package
translation.ko: 휴가 때 찍은 사진들과 집에 보낸 편지들 같은

translation.en: of holiday photographs and letters home.
translation.ko: 도움이 될 만한 자료가 담긴 소포도 보냈다는군

translation.en: But that package has not arrived.
How can we help find them if we've lost their damn photographs?
translation.ko: 그 사진들을 잃어버렸으면 어떻게 그들을 찾지?

translation.en: Perhaps if you left it with me?
They talk about the Communists, sir.
They ask if Thailand might also fall to revolution.
Well, it might improve the traffic.
Yotin, it started at 4:00 and it's already quarter past.
Surely it would be quicker to walk? This is Athidhaya Road.
translation.ko: 걸어가는 게 빠르지 않겠어? 여긴 아티드하야 거리야

translation.en: The athletic club is only three or four blocks north.
translation.ko: 스포츠 클럽까지 북쪽으로 서너 블록만 가면 되잖아

translation.en: -But Mr. Knippenberg-- -I can't just sit here.
translation.ko: - 하지만 크니펜베르흐 씨… - 마냥 기다릴 순 없어

translation.en: [in Dutch] Ambassador. I'm sorry, the traffic was unbelievable.
translation.ko: 대사님, 죄송합니다 길이 막혀서 옴짝달싹 못 했어요

translation.en: [in Dutch] We didn't move a yard in 30 minutes, and the rain...
This is Knippenberg, my Third Secretary.
Knippenberg, this is Giles Easton, my opposite number with the British.
translation.ko: 크니펜베르흐, 여긴 자일스 이스턴 방콕 주재 영국 대사일세

translation.en: -How do you do? How do you do? -Good afternoon.
-Good shot! -Ambassador, may I speak with you--
translation.ko: - 굿 샷! - 대사님, 잠깐 드릴 말씀이…

translation.en: I told Angela to play with De Jongh. As you were late.
translation.ko: 자네가 늦어서 앙겔라한테 더용과 치라고 했네

translation.en: -You didn't tell me she was learning Thai. -Did I not?
translation.ko: - 자네 처가 태국어를 배운다고? - 말씀 안 드렸나요?

translation.en: To add to the four or five other languages she already speaks.
translation.ko: 이미 4, 5개 국어를 하는 것도 모자라나 봐

translation.en: If she wasn't German, I'd offer her a job!
Well, if you weren't Dutch, I might take it.
Mr. Ambassador, may I speak with you briefly on a consular matter?
translation.ko: 대사님, 잠깐 영사관 사안을 말씀드려도 될까요?

translation.en: I thought the office was shut.
Yes, no, of course, but I thought this was rather urgent.
translation.ko: 네, 물론이죠 하지만 좀 급한 사안이라서요
젊은 네덜란드 배낭족 두 명에 관한 겁니다

translation.en: Their families haven't heard from them in over two months.
translation.ko: 가족들이 두 달 넘게 소식을 못 들었다고 합니다

translation.en: Knippenberg, when did you last speak to your mother?
translation.ko: 크니펜베르흐, 자네 모친과 언제 마지막으로 통화했나?

translation.en: And does she write letters declaring you missing?
It's not a diplomat's job to go chasing after longhair bums.
translation.ko: 히피들을 쫓아다니는 건 외교관의 일이 아니네

translation.en: If it's for anyone, it's for the Thai police.
Pass it on to them if you're so concerned.
[Dutch ambassador] Once again, a Dutch triumph over you Brits.
Worried family. But it's a police matter, apparently.
My mother warned me about this.
He will never take the day off to make love to you
on the 15th floor of the Siam Point."
Well, it only has eight floors, so technically, she was correct.
translation.ko: 그건 8층짜리 건물이니까 엄밀히 말하면 장모님 말씀이 맞지

translation.en: [in Dutch] Why are you writing that? Alain said we could stay at his place.
translation.ko: 왜 그걸 적어? 알랭이 자기 집에서 지내랬잖아

translation.en: [in Dutch] It's too much. Too generous.
[in Dutch] But Alain is expecting us.
[in Dutch] We can go and see them later.
-Alain sent me. I work for him. -How did you know it was us?
translation.ko: - 알랭이 보냈어요, 제 보스예요 - 어떻게 우린 줄 알았죠?

translation.en: Let me help you with your bags. We're all expecting you.
We were planning on going to the Santa Cruz first?
No. Alain wouldn't allow it. Not for his friends.
translation.ko: 알랭이 못 가게 할 거예요 친구들을 아끼거든요

translation.en: That place gets worse by the week.
The bathwater comes straight out of the klong.
-We don't want to go to the-- -No.
Welcome to Bangkok. Come on, then. [chuckling]
-[Lena] Nice to see you. -[Monique] You too. Welcome.
-Welcome to Kanit House. -[Wim] Thank you very much.
-How was the trip? -Yeah, it was good.
-This is for you. For you. -Thank you.
[Dominique] Here, I'll take your bag for you.
[Charles] Come on. We'll wash your dirty things for you.
translation.ko: 가죠, 더러운 옷 세탁은 저희에게 맡기세요

translation.en: -[Wim] But it's all dirty. -[Charles] Then we'll wash it all.
[in Dutch] Thanks for not listening to me.
[Charles] Now, wash, rest. Make yourself at home.
[in Thai] I'm calling from the Dutch Embassy on behalf of Herman Knippenberg.
translation.ko: 헤르만 크니펜베르흐 씨를 대신해 네덜란드 대사관에서 전화드립니다

translation.en: [in Thai] I'd like to talk to someone concerning a missing persons enquiry.
I am very sorry, Mr. Knippenberg,
but the police ask us to call back after the holiday.

translation.ko: - 할 수 없지, 나가 봐 - 알겠습니다

translation.en: [in Dutch] Knippenberg, you've passed that business onto the police?
Oh, Mr. Siemons? It's Herman Knippenberg.
I sit on the Intergovernmental Narcotics Liaison with you.
translation.ko: 저도 정부 간 마약 연락 담당관이에요

translation.en: -[Siemons] Which one are you? -[Herman] Excuse me?
also asks you to manage its more irregular problems.
translation.ko: 벨기에 대사관도 시몬스 씨한테 특이한 문제들을 맡긴다고 알고 있습니다

translation.en: [Siemons] And what can I do for you, my clog-wearing friend?
translation.ko: 뭘 도와주면 되겠나 나막신 신는 친구?

translation.en: You know they're not technically your problem?
translation.ko: 엄밀히 말하면 그건 자네 문제가 아니야

translation.en: Yes. The Ambassador says to phone the police,
They expect great things of you, I imagine.
Taken at Johns Hopkins, Bologna and Washington.
translation.ko: 존스 홉킨스 볼로냐 대학 분교와 워싱턴 대학에서 취득했죠

translation.en: And now you want to fuck it all up?
-Now, you want to find them? -Well, yes.
First, did they even get here?
If they did, there will be documentation. Landing cards.
translation.ko: 그랬다면 서류가 있을 거야 "빌럼 블룸 헬레나 데커르" 입국 카드

translation.en: These young travelers rely on them for news from home.
translation.ko: 젊은 여행객들에겐 집 소식을 듣는 수단이니까

translation.en: So, check if they pick up any letters.
[Angela] I thought the Ambassador told you to pass it on to the police?
I don't speak the language, Angela.
[in Thai] Do you have any letters for Willem Bloem or Helena Dekker?
translation.ko: 빌럼 블룸이나 헬레나 데커르한테 온 편지가 있나요?

translation.en: [man replies in Thai] Six for Bloem from Amsterdam.
Did you ever hear of this place?
It's one of those traveler hostels.
It's where I go to buy your pot.
I wonder if you might help me. I work for the Dutch embassy.
translation.ko: 뭐 좀 물어볼게요 난 네덜란드 대사관에서 일해요

translation.en: Here on their landing cards it says Santa Cruz Hotel.
translation.ko: 두 사람 입국 카드에 산타크루스 호텔이 적혀 있어요

translation.en: I wonder if you could look to see if they checked in?
Hey, Company Man! Are you done? Or do you need a xerox?
translation.ko: 회사원 양반, 다 끝났어요? 아니면 복사기 필요해요?

translation.en: but never made it to the hotel.
Perhaps they didn't stick to their schedule, Company Man.
translation.ko: 일정대로 안 움직였나 보네 회사원 양반

translation.en: [American accent] Sorry. I just got in.
-Bad jet lag. -[English accent] No hassle, man.
Um... I'm heading to Nepal tomorrow.
Do you want to split a room maybe? Might be cheaper.
translation.ko: 방 같이 쓸래요? 돈도 아낄 겸

translation.en: -[English girl] Hey, what's your name? -[American girl] Teresa.
Hey, you're not a Jesus freak, are you?
Why Nepal if you don't smoke hash?
translation.ko: 대마초도 안 피우면서 네팔엔 왜 가?
카트만두는 아직도 열반에 환장한 사람들 성지야

translation.en: Sure you don't want to get high?
I mean, isn't all this a little bit of a trip already?
Seriously, maybe you're, like, my spirit guide or something.
translation.ko: 농담 아니라, 네가 내 영혼의 인도자 같아

translation.en: Well, your spirit guide needs a fucking drink.
-Celia? Ah! What are you doing tonight? -Thanks.
translation.ko: - 실리아? 오늘 밤에 뭐 해요? - 고마워

translation.en: Hey, there's a party, you guys should both come.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 파티가 있는데 같이 안 갈래요?

translation.en: -Don't know. -Really, it'll be a cool scene.
Hip, you know? Not like the tourists here.
Save it for the next two girls you pick up.
The next two girls won't be you two though, will they?
There's a pool. Bring your bikinis and we can have a swim.
translation.ko: 수영장도 있어요 비키니 가져오면 수영할 수 있어요

translation.en: Or don't bring your bikinis, and we can have a swim.
translation.ko: 비키니 안 가져와도 수영할 수 있죠

translation.en: Let's drop him. He's a creep.
-Let me tell you where I'm headed. -Yeah?
I'm going to a Buddhist monastery.
I was there a year ago and I'm going back, but to live.
translation.ko: 1년 전에 거기 있었는데 살려고 돌아가는 거야

translation.en: There's a whole bunch of things that I will never get to do again,
translation.ko: 다시는 할 수 없는 게 너무 많아서

translation.en: and I want to do them now.

translation.ko: - 그렇다면 할 수 없지 - 넌 멋져

translation.en: So are you. So are you, hon.
-Erm, okay, cool, well, have fun. -I'll see you...
[Herman] I did everything you said, Paul. Wim Bloem and Lena Dekker
translation.ko: "넉 달 후" 다 조사해봤어요, 폴 빔 블룸과 레나 데커르는

translation.en: landed in Bangkok but never checked in to their--
[Australian accent] Oi, Siemons! Who's your girlfriend?
-[laughs] Laver. Australia. -Laver, like the tennis player, right?
translation.ko: - 레이버, 호주 대사관 담당이야 - 레이버, 테니스 선수 이름이죠?

translation.en: Nothing like, mate. More's the fucking pity.
[slurring] How long you got left, Ker-nippenberg?
Quite some time. We only arrived six months ago.
Knippenberg has lost a couple of longhairs
They're someone's children and they're missing.
I disagree. What they do is hard work.
Let's get them all a fucking medal, shall we?
If you'll excuse me for one moment?
[manager] Your friends are not welcome here.
translation.ko: 이 여자들은 여기 오면 안 돼요

translation.en: [Laver] I'll tell you a story about longhairs.
It's a good story, once you get to the end. [sniffs]
I had a pair of murder victims
on a Thai cop mortuary slab.
They'd been killed, set on fire,
They found them in a ditch 58 Ks south of the old city at Ayutthaya.
I thought you said this was a good story?
You got to wait to the end, don't you?
You ever go to bed with two women at the same time?
translation.ko: 동시에 두 여자랑 잔 적 있나?

translation.en: The travelers, what happened to the travelers?
-Forgive me, the Belgian attaché... -[whistling] ...is a constant embarrassment.
translation.ko: 실례했네, 벨기에 담당관 때문에 창피해서 못 살겠군

translation.en: -[Australian man] Time to go, mate. -[Laver] My advice?
Don't waste your time with longhairs.
I'm staying right here till morning.
See it through with me, Cloggy.
Mr. Laver, your story about the two Australian travelers?
translation.ko: 레이버 씨, 호주인 여행객 두 명 말인데요

translation.en: -That was their names? -That's who the cops thought they were.
-[man announces over PA in Thai] -But they weren't?
Told you it was a good story.
So your bodies, you still have no names for them?
translation.ko: 그럼 레이버 씨의 시신들은 여전히 신원 미상인가요?

translation.en: No! Not mine. Not my bodies.
Not any more, mate. That's someone else's problem.
Whose problem are the two unidentified bodies?
translation.ko: 그 신원 미상 시신들은 누구의 문제예요?

translation.en: Whose bloody murder case is it?
Hey! Keep your hair on, you little fucking mouse with clogs on.
-Eastern Division. You're sure? -Sure as eggs, mate.
And the Australian couple, where are they now?
translation.ko: 그 호주 커플은 지금 어디 있어요?

translation.en: What I've been trying to tell you, mate.
They've been on some island living on coconuts and fish heads.
translation.ko: 어떤 섬에서 코코넛과 생선 대가리를 먹고 살았다더군

translation.en: [Wim] Excuse me, Alain. Have you seen Lena?
The friends you make when you're far away from home.
-It's the best thing about it, I think. -Yes.
So, can I ask how you guys ended up here together?
translation.ko: 두 분이 어떻게 여기서 살게 됐는지 물어봐도 돼요?

translation.en: He made it impossible for me.
You two are going to get married, yes?
Well, she's not marrying anyone else, that's for sure.
translation.ko: 레나는 다른 남자랑 결혼 안 해요 그건 확실해요

translation.en: -[Lena] Not as romantic as you and Alain. -I want to help you.
translation.ko: - 알랭과 정말 낭만적이세요 - 당신을 돕고 싶어요

translation.en: Those two stones you just saw me sell?
translation.ko: 내가 판 보석 두 개 봤죠?

translation.en: Two of those you could sell in Amsterdam for 15,000 guilders.
translation.ko: 암스테르담에선 그 두 개를 15,000길더에 팔 수 있어요

translation.en: Lena says she doesn't care about money.
Of course she does. She's young.
And she's a little bit of a hippy.
But she doesn't face the same challenges you do.
I know what it's like, Wim, back in Europe.
There's two men applying for the same position,
translation.ko: 한 자리를 두고 두 남자가 지원하면

translation.en: It happened to my father all the time.
I think every man must one day make a home.
And say to himself, "This is my life,
translation.ko: 그리고 이렇게 말해야 하죠 '이건 내 인생이야'

translation.en: and this is who I am."
But to get there, for men like you and me,
translation.ko: 하지만 그렇게 되려면 당신과 나 같은 남자들은

translation.en: we must take our opportunities when they come.
[Lena, in Dutch] Are you sure we should do that?
[Lena, in Dutch] I know they want to help, but...
More than he told me they had.
[Ajay] Oh! Don't you just hate a lie?
You know, we only want to help.
He wants us to buy the gems
and sell them for twice what we paid when we get home.
translation.ko: 집에 돌아가면 두 배를 받고 팔라는 거잖아요

translation.en: You don't think that's a good idea?
The money will give you a good start,
-In any case, we really can't afford it. -I don't believe you.
translation.ko: - 그러고 싶어도 형편이 안 돼요 - 그 말 안 믿어요

translation.en: -[Angela] Taxi for Knippenberg! -You took your bloody time.
translation.ko: - 크니펜베르흐 씨 택시예요! - 기다리다 날 새겠어

translation.en: -[man announces over PA in Thai] -It's almost curfew.
You know, anytime you want to learn to drive,
You can call Yotin if you want someone to bark at.
[sighs] No one at the Embassy can know what we're about to do.
translation.ko: 대사관 직원은 우리가 할 일을 알면 안 돼

translation.en: What if we're caught? If you're caught?
It's very cold in Holland right now, Herman.
-Monique. It's her place. -Oh, um, you're the gem dealer.
translation.ko: - 모니크, 이 집 주인이죠 - 보석 중개인이군요

translation.en: I am not. He is the gem dealer.
-[Dominique] Yeah, they are cool. -[Teresa] You want to dance?
Soon as it starts ringing, I've gotta go.
-How do I say "I'm sorry" in French? -[clears throat] Um...
You know, it's crazy but I've never slept with a Frenchman before.
translation.ko: 황당한 말 같겠지만 난 프랑스 남자란 잔 적이 없어요

translation.en: [in French] Monique needs you to bring up more ice.
If you're going to be a nun,
why do you have all these travelers' cheques?
translation.ko: 이 많은 여행자 수표가 왜 필요하죠?

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, they're not for me. They're for the monastery.
translation.ko: 제가 쓸 게 아니라 수도원에 헌금할 거예요

translation.en: [Charles] The cost of pursuing Nirvana goes up and up.
So, you want to renounce the world entirely?
No, I don't renounce the world.
Just the people who run it.
On my heart, you are too young to lock yourself away.
translation.ko: 내가 볼 때 당신은 비구니가 되기엔 너무 어려요

translation.en: Your life too full of opportunity.
Did Ajay tell you what I do?
I buy. I sell. And from time to time, others sell for me.
I am not going to smuggle gemstones for you.
translation.ko: 당신을 위해 보석을 밀반입할 생각 없어요

translation.en: -I'm taking vows. -And yet I find you here,
translation.ko: - 난 비구니가 될 거예요 - 그런데 이곳에 와서

translation.en: openly offering yourself to my friend Dominique.
translation.ko: 내 친구 도미니크에게 몸을 주려고 안달이군요

translation.en: In which case, may I ask, have you been to...
translation.ko: 그건 그렇고 하나 물어보죠 혹시 가봤어요?

translation.en: What shall we call them? Nightclubs here?
Oh, you mean the sex shows?
before you retreat from the world,
[Teresa howls and laughs] Oh, my God!
You think I don't know how a fucking downer comes on?
translation.ko: 나한테 약을 먹인지 모를 것 같아?

translation.en: -Don't touch me! Help! -[spectators cheering and whistling]
He's Alain, he's Ajay! They fucking drugged me!
[Charles] You draw attention to yourself, Teresa.
[Teresa] Please take it all. Please take it.
You throw yourself at men the way you throw yourself at religion.
translation.ko: 종교에 몸을 내던지듯 남자들에게도 몸을 내던지지

translation.en: You cannot buy your way off the wheel, Teresa.
translation.ko: 돈으로 열반을 살 순 없어, 테리사

translation.en: It is very American of you to think otherwise.
Americans do not prosper in this part of the world.
-Fuck you. -[Ajay] Hey, where are we going?
Aren't we leaving her at the Santa Cruz?
And you saw, she's not afraid to complain.
She will only be another reckless Westerner
who took drugs and went swimming.
[sighs] Once, I stole a taxi in Peshawar.
I had to take it to Tehran, you see?
The driver refused so I had to dose him.
translation.ko: 택시 기사가 거부하길래 약을 먹어야 했어

translation.en: I put him in the trunk...
he awoke and began to moan and thump.
It was upsetting the other passengers,
so I stopped at a river to check on him.
so I took him out and helped him into the water.
translation.ko: 그래서 그의 시신을 꺼내서 강에 던져버렸어

translation.en: I expected to feel great guilt,
Did they come looking for you? Did they catch you?
Nobody has ever caught me, Ajay. No one.
This person is going from this world
The light of this life has set.
She is embarking on a great battle.
She is seized by the great evil spirit.
She is terrified by the messengers
She is entering existence after existence.
Because of her karma, she is helpless.
The time has come when she must go alone
translation.ko: 그녀가 혼자 가야 할 때가 왔다

translation.en: [Wim] And the remains of their clothing.
Why has no one done anything?
